ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] More than 6 in a group?
ygData.msgSnippet: I juuust have to say, 6+ member groups is an exploit. The use of exploits fundamentally chnges the game experience for yourself and others and brings on more
ygData.messageBody:
I juuust have to say, 6+ member groups is an exploit. The use of exploits
fundamentally chnges the game experience for yourself and others and brings
on more and more restrictive coding that very often negativly affects other
"freedom"s in the game. I will not participate in a seven member group, I
leave, and petition them. Using exploits is irresponsible and selfish I
happily petition whenever and wherever I see them being used..

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, Povar
